reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 15/16: MONETARY PENALTIES: PRESCRIBED LEGISLATION
reg_info.act_under: Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996

content.content: 1. The Gaming Control Act, 1992 and Ontario Regulation 78/12 (General) made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996. Horse Racing Licence Act, 2015
content.raw_html:
1. The Gaming Control Act, 1992 and Ontario Regulation 78/12 (General) made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996.

Horse Racing Licence Act, 2015

content.content: 2. The Horse Racing Licence Act, 2015 is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996. O. Reg. 15/16, s. 6 (2). Liquor Control Act
content.raw_html:
2. The Horse Racing Licence Act, 2015 is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996. O. Reg. 15/16, s. 6 (2).

Liquor Control Act

content.content:
3. The Liquor Control Act and the following regulations made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the
Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996: 1. Ontario Regulation 232/16 (Sale of Liquor in Government Stores). 2. Regulation 717 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General). O. Reg. 234/16, s. 1. Liquor Licence Act
content.raw_html:
3. The Liquor Control Act and the following regulations made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996:

1. Ontario Regulation 232/16 (Sale of Liquor in Government Stores).

2. Regulation 717 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General). O. Reg. 234/16, s. 1.

Liquor Licence Act

content.content:
4. The Liquor Licence Act and the following regulations made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the
Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996: 1. Ontario Regulation 58/00 (Ferment on Premise Facilities). 2. Regulation 718 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General). 3. Regulation 719 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Licences to Sell Liquor). 4. Regulation 720 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Manufacturers’ Licences). 5. Ontario Regulation 389/91 (Special Occasion Permits).
content.raw_html:
4. The Liquor Licence Act and the following regulations made under that Act are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996:

1. Ontario Regulation 58/00 (Ferment on Premise Facilities).

2. Regulation 718 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General).

3. Regulation 719 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Licences to Sell Liquor).

4. Regulation 720 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Manufacturers’ Licences).

5. Ontario Regulation 389/91 (Special Occasion Permits).

content.content: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
